096/**
097 * The Class {@link VmAccess}. The component supports the following
098 * configuration properties:
099 * 
100 *   * `displayResource`: a map with the following entries:
101 *       - `preferredIpVersion`: `ipv4` or `ipv6` (default: `ipv4`).
102 *         Determines the IP addresses uses in the generated
103 *         connection file.
104 *   * `deleteConnectionFile`: `true` or `false` (default: `true`).
105 *     If `true`, the downloaded connection file will be deleted by
106 *     the remote viewer when opened.
107 *   * `syncPreviewsFor`: a list objects with either property `user` or
108 *     `role` and the associated name (default: `[]`).
109 *     The remote viewer will synchronize the previews for the specified
110 *     users and roles.
111 *
112 */
113@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis", "PMD.ExcessiveImports",
114    "PMD.CouplingBetweenObjects", "PMD.GodClass", "PMD.TooManyMethods",
115    "PMD.CyclomaticComplexity" })
116public class VmAccess extends FreeMarkerConlet<VmAccess.ResourceModel> {
117
118    private static final String VM_NAME_PROPERTY = "vmName";
119    private static final String POOL_NAME_PROPERTY = "poolName";
120    private static final String RENDERED
121        = VmAccess.class.getName() + ".rendered";
122    private static final String PENDING
123        = VmAccess.class.getName() + ".pending";
124    private static final Set<RenderMode> MODES = RenderMode.asSet(
125        RenderMode.Preview, RenderMode.Edit);
126    private static final Set<RenderMode> MODES_FOR_GENERATED = RenderMode.asSet(
127        RenderMode.Preview, RenderMode.StickyPreview);
128    private EventPipeline appPipeline;
129    private static ObjectMapper objectMapper
130        = new ObjectMapper().registerModule(new JavaTimeModule());
131    private Class<?> preferredIpVersion = Inet4Address.class;
132    private Set<String> syncUsers = Collections.emptySet();
133    private Set<String> syncRoles = Collections.emptySet();
134    private boolean deleteConnectionFile = true;
135
136    /**
137     * The periodically generated update event.
138     */
139    public static class Update extends Event<Void> {
140    }
141
142    /**
143     * Creates a new component with its channel set to the given channel.
144     * 
145     * @param componentChannel the channel that the component's handlers listen
146     * on by default and that {@link Manager#fire(Event, Channel...)}
147     * sends the event to
148     */
149    public VmAccess(Channel componentChannel) {
150        super(componentChannel);
151    }
152
153    /**
154     * On start.
155     *
156     * @param event the event
157     */
158    @Handler
159    public void onStart(Start event) {
160        appPipeline = event.processedBy().get();
161    }
162
163    /**
164     * Configure the component. 
165     * 
166     * @param event the event
167     */
168    @SuppressWarnings({ "unchecked", "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals" })
169    @Handler
170    public void onConfigurationUpdate(ConfigurationUpdate event) {
171        event.structured(componentPath())
172            .or(() -> {
173                var oldConfig = event.structured("/Manager/GuiHttpServer"
174                    + "/ConsoleWeblet/WebConsole/ComponentCollector/VmViewer");
175                if (oldConfig.isPresent()) {
176                    logger.warning(() -> "Using configuration with old "
177                        + "component name \"VmViewer\", please update to "
178                        + "\"VmAccess\"");
179                }
180                return oldConfig;
181            })
182            .ifPresent(c -> {
183                try {
184                    var dispRes = (Map<String, Object>) c
185                        .getOrDefault("displayResource",
186                            Collections.emptyMap());
187                    switch ((String) dispRes.getOrDefault("preferredIpVersion",
188                        "")) {
189                    case "ipv6":
190                        preferredIpVersion = Inet6Address.class;
191                        break;
192                    case "ipv4":
193                    default:
194                        preferredIpVersion = Inet4Address.class;
195                        break;
196                    }
197
198                    // Delete connection file
199                    deleteConnectionFile
200                        = Optional.ofNullable(c.get("deleteConnectionFile"))
201                            .filter(v -> v instanceof String)
202                            .map(v -> (String) v)
203                            .map(Boolean::parseBoolean).orElse(true);
204
205                    // Users or roles for which previews should be synchronized
206                    syncUsers = ((List<Map<String, String>>) c.getOrDefault(
207                        "syncPreviewsFor", Collections.emptyList())).stream()
208                            .map(m -> m.get("user"))
209                            .filter(s -> s != null).collect(Collectors.toSet());
210                    logger.finest(() -> "Syncing previews for users: "
211                        + syncUsers.toString());
212                    syncRoles = ((List<Map<String, String>>) c.getOrDefault(
213                        "syncPreviewsFor", Collections.emptyList())).stream()
214                            .map(m -> m.get("role"))
215                            .filter(s -> s != null).collect(Collectors.toSet());
216                    logger.finest(() -> "Syncing previews for roles: "
217                        + syncRoles.toString());
218                } catch (ClassCastException e) {
219                    logger.config("Malformed configuration: " + e.getMessage());
220                }
221            });
222    }
223
224    private boolean syncPreviews(Session session) {
225        return WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
226            .filter(u -> syncUsers.contains(u.getName())).isPresent()
227            || WebConsoleUtils.rolesFromSession(session).stream()
228                .filter(cr -> syncRoles.contains(cr.getName())).findAny()
229                .isPresent();
230    }
231
232    /**
233     * On {@link ConsoleReady}, fire the {@link AddConletType}.
234     *
235     * @param event the event
236     * @param channel the channel
237     * @throws TemplateNotFoundException the template not found exception
238     * @throws MalformedTemplateNameException the malformed template name
239     *             exception
240     * @throws ParseException the parse exception
241     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
242     */
243    @Handler
244    public void onConsoleReady(ConsoleReady event, ConsoleConnection channel)
245            throws TemplateNotFoundException, MalformedTemplateNameException,
246            ParseException, IOException {
247        // Add conlet resources to page
248        channel.respond(new AddConletType(type())
249            .setDisplayNames(
250                localizations(channel.supportedLocales(), "conletName"))
251            .addRenderMode(RenderMode.Preview)
252            .addScript(new ScriptResource().setScriptType("module")
253                .setScriptUri(event.renderSupport().conletResource(
254                    type(), "VmAccess-functions.js"))));
255        channel.session().put(RENDERED, new HashSet<>());
256    }
257
258    /**
259     * On console configured.
260     *
261     * @param event the event
262     * @param connection the console connection
263     * @throws InterruptedException the interrupted exception
264     */
265    @Handler
266    public void onConsoleConfigured(ConsoleConfigured event,
267            ConsoleConnection connection) throws InterruptedException,
268            IOException {
269        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
270        final var rendered
271            = (Set<ResourceModel>) connection.session().get(RENDERED);
272        connection.session().remove(RENDERED);
273        if (!syncPreviews(connection.session())) {
274            return;
275        }
276        addMissingConlets(event, connection, rendered);
277    }
278
279    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops",
280        "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals" })
281    private void addMissingConlets(ConsoleConfigured event,
282            ConsoleConnection connection, final Set<ResourceModel> rendered)
283            throws InterruptedException {
284        var session = connection.session();
285
286        // Evaluate missing VMs
287        var missingVms = appPipeline.fire(new GetVms().accessibleFor(
288            WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
289                .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse(null),
290            WebConsoleUtils.rolesFromSession(session).stream()
291                .map(ConsoleRole::getName).toList()))
292            .get().stream().map(d -> d.definition().name())
293            .collect(Collectors.toCollection(HashSet::new));
294        missingVms.removeAll(rendered.stream()
295            .filter(r -> r.mode() == ResourceModel.Mode.VM)
296            .map(ResourceModel::name).toList());
297
298        // Evaluate missing pools
299        var missingPools = appPipeline.fire(new GetPools().accessibleFor(
300            WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
301                .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse(null),
302            WebConsoleUtils.rolesFromSession(session).stream()
303                .map(ConsoleRole::getName).toList()))
304            .get().stream().map(VmPool::name)
305            .collect(Collectors.toCollection(HashSet::new));
306        missingPools.removeAll(rendered.stream()
307            .filter(r -> r.mode() == ResourceModel.Mode.POOL)
308            .map(ResourceModel::name).toList());
309
310        // Nothing to do
311        if (missingVms.isEmpty() && missingPools.isEmpty()) {
312            return;
313        }
314
315        // Suspending to allow rendering of conlets to be noticed
316        var failSafe = Components.schedule(t -> event.resumeHandling(),
317            Duration.ofSeconds(1));
318        event.suspendHandling(failSafe::cancel);
319        connection.setAssociated(PENDING, event);
320
321        // Create conlets for VMs and pools that haven't been rendered
322        for (var vmName : missingVms) {
323            fire(new AddConletRequest(event.event().event().renderSupport(),
324                VmAccess.class.getName(), RenderMode.asSet(RenderMode.Preview))
325                    .addProperty(VM_NAME_PROPERTY, vmName),
326                connection);
327        }
328        for (var poolName : missingPools) {
329            fire(new AddConletRequest(event.event().event().renderSupport(),
330                VmAccess.class.getName(), RenderMode.asSet(RenderMode.Preview))
331                    .addProperty(POOL_NAME_PROPERTY, poolName),
332                connection);
333        }
334    }
335
336    /**
337     * On console prepared.
338     *
339     * @param event the event
340     * @param connection the connection
341     */
342    @Handler
343    public void onConsolePrepared(ConsolePrepared event,
344            ConsoleConnection connection) {
345        if (syncPreviews(connection.session())) {
346            connection.respond(new UpdateConletType(type()));
347        }
348    }
349
350    private String storagePath(Session session, String conletId) {
351        return "/" + WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
352            .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse("")
353            + "/" + VmAccess.class.getName() + "/" + conletId;
354    }
355
356    @Override
357    protected Optional<ResourceModel> createNewState(AddConletRequest event,
358            ConsoleConnection connection, String conletId) throws Exception {
359        var model = new ResourceModel(conletId);
360        var poolName = (String) event.properties().get(POOL_NAME_PROPERTY);
361        if (poolName != null) {
362            model.setMode(ResourceModel.Mode.POOL);
363            model.setName(poolName);
364        } else {
365            model.setMode(ResourceModel.Mode.VM);
366            model.setName((String) event.properties().get(VM_NAME_PROPERTY));
367        }
368        String jsonState = objectMapper.writeValueAsString(model);
369        connection.respond(new KeyValueStoreUpdate().update(
370            storagePath(connection.session(), model.getConletId()), jsonState));
371        return Optional.of(model);
372    }
373
374    @Override
375    protected Optional<ResourceModel> createStateRepresentation(Event<?> event,
376            ConsoleConnection connection, String conletId) throws Exception {
377        var model = new ResourceModel(conletId);
378        String jsonState = objectMapper.writeValueAsString(model);
379        connection.respond(new KeyValueStoreUpdate().update(
380            storagePath(connection.session(), model.getConletId()), jsonState));
381        return Optional.of(model);
382    }
383
384    @Override
385    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.EmptyCatchBlock")
386    protected Optional<ResourceModel> recreateState(Event<?> event,
387            ConsoleConnection channel, String conletId) throws Exception {
388        KeyValueStoreQuery query = new KeyValueStoreQuery(
389            storagePath(channel.session(), conletId), channel);
390        newEventPipeline().fire(query, channel);
391        try {
392            if (!query.results().isEmpty()) {
393                var json = query.results().get(0).values().stream().findFirst()
394                    .get();
395                ResourceModel model
396                    = objectMapper.readValue(json, ResourceModel.class);
397                return Optional.of(model);
398            }
399        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
400            // Means we have no result.
401        }
402
403        // Fall back to creating default state.
404        return createStateRepresentation(event, channel, conletId);
405    }
406
407    @Override
408    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops" })
409    protected Set<RenderMode> doRenderConlet(RenderConletRequestBase<?> event,
410            ConsoleConnection channel, String conletId, ResourceModel model)
411            throws Exception {
412        if (event.renderAs().contains(RenderMode.Preview)) {
413            return renderPreview(event, channel, conletId, model);
414        }
415
416        // Render edit
417        ResourceBundle resourceBundle = resourceBundle(channel.locale());
418        Set<RenderMode> renderedAs = EnumSet.noneOf(RenderMode.class);
419        if (event.renderAs().contains(RenderMode.Edit)) {
420            var session = channel.session();
421            var vmNames = appPipeline.fire(new GetVms().accessibleFor(
422                WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
423                    .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse(null),
424                WebConsoleUtils.rolesFromSession(session).stream()
425                    .map(ConsoleRole::getName).toList()))
426                .get().stream().map(d -> d.definition().name()).sorted()
427                .toList();
428            var poolNames = appPipeline.fire(new GetPools().accessibleFor(
429                WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
430                    .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse(null),
431                WebConsoleUtils.rolesFromSession(session).stream()
432                    .map(ConsoleRole::getName).toList()))
433                .get().stream().map(VmPool::name).sorted().toList();
434            Template tpl
435                = freemarkerConfig().getTemplate("VmAccess-edit.ftl.html");
436            var fmModel = fmModel(event, channel, conletId, model);
437            fmModel.put("vmNames", vmNames);
438            fmModel.put("poolNames", poolNames);
439            channel.respond(new OpenModalDialog(type(), conletId,
440                processTemplate(event, tpl, fmModel))
441                    .addOption("cancelable", true)
442                    .addOption("okayLabel",
443                        resourceBundle.getString("okayLabel")));
444        }
445        return renderedAs;
446    }
447
448    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
449    private Set<RenderMode> renderPreview(RenderConletRequestBase<?> event,
450            ConsoleConnection channel, String conletId, ResourceModel model)
451            throws TemplateNotFoundException, MalformedTemplateNameException,
452            ParseException, IOException, InterruptedException {
453        channel.associated(PENDING, Event.class)
454            .ifPresent(e -> {
455                e.resumeHandling();
456                channel.setAssociated(PENDING, null);
457            });
458
459        VmDefinition vmDef = null;
460        if (model.mode() == ResourceModel.Mode.VM && model.name() != null) {
461            // Remove conlet if VM definition has been removed
462            // or user has not at least one permission
463            vmDef = getVmData(model, channel).map(VmData::definition)
464                .orElse(null);
465            if (vmDef == null) {
466                channel.respond(
467                    new DeleteConlet(conletId, Collections.emptySet()));
468                return Collections.emptySet();
469            }
470        }
471
472        if (model.mode() == ResourceModel.Mode.POOL && model.name() != null) {
473            // Remove conlet if pool definition has been removed
474            // or user has not at least one permission
475            VmPool pool = appPipeline
476                .fire(new GetPools().withName(model.name())).get()
477                .stream().findFirst().orElse(null);
478            if (pool == null
479                || permissions(pool, channel.session()).isEmpty()) {
480                channel.respond(
481                    new DeleteConlet(conletId, Collections.emptySet()));
482                return Collections.emptySet();
483            }
484            vmDef = getVmData(model, channel).map(VmData::definition)
485                .orElse(null);
486        }
487
488        // Render
489        Template tpl
490            = freemarkerConfig().getTemplate("VmAccess-preview.ftl.html");
491        channel.respond(new RenderConlet(type(), conletId,
492            processTemplate(event, tpl,
493                fmModel(event, channel, conletId, model)))
494                    .setRenderAs(
495                        RenderMode.Preview.addModifiers(event.renderAs()))
496                    .setSupportedModes(syncPreviews(channel.session())
497                        ? MODES_FOR_GENERATED
498                        : MODES));
499        if (!Strings.isNullOrEmpty(model.name())) {
500            Optional.ofNullable(channel.session().get(RENDERED))
501                .ifPresent(s -> ((Set<ResourceModel>) s).add(model));
502            updatePreview(channel, model, vmDef);
503        }
504        return EnumSet.of(RenderMode.Preview);
505    }
506
507    private Optional<VmData> getVmData(ResourceModel model,
508            ConsoleConnection channel) throws InterruptedException {
509        if (model.mode() == ResourceModel.Mode.VM) {
510            // Get the VM data by name.
511            var session = channel.session();
512            return appPipeline.fire(new GetVms().withName(model.name())
513                .accessibleFor(WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
514                    .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse(null),
515                    WebConsoleUtils.rolesFromSession(session).stream()
516                        .map(ConsoleRole::getName).toList()))
517                .get().stream().findFirst();
518        }
519
520        // Look for an (already) assigned VM
521        var user = WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(channel.session())
522            .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse(null);
523        return appPipeline.fire(new GetVms().assignedFrom(model.name())
524            .assignedTo(user)).get().stream().findFirst();
525    }
526
527    private Set<Permission> permissions(VmDefinition vmDef, Session session) {
528        var user = WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
529            .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse(null);
530        var roles = WebConsoleUtils.rolesFromSession(session)
531            .stream().map(ConsoleRole::getName).toList();
532        return vmDef.permissionsFor(user, roles);
533    }
534
535    private Set<Permission> permissions(VmPool pool, Session session) {
536        var user = WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
537            .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse(null);
538        var roles = WebConsoleUtils.rolesFromSession(session)
539            .stream().map(ConsoleRole::getName).toList();
540        return pool.permissionsFor(user, roles);
541    }
542
543    private Set<Permission> permissions(ResourceModel model, Session session,
544            VmPool pool, VmDefinition vmDef) throws InterruptedException {
545        var user = WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
546            .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse(null);
547        var roles = WebConsoleUtils.rolesFromSession(session)
548            .stream().map(ConsoleRole::getName).toList();
549        Set<Permission> result = new HashSet<>();
550        if (model.mode() == ResourceModel.Mode.POOL) {
551            if (pool == null) {
552                pool = appPipeline.fire(new GetPools()
553                    .withName(model.name())).get().stream().findFirst()
554                    .orElse(null);
555            }
556            if (pool != null) {
557                result.addAll(pool.permissionsFor(user, roles));
558            }
559        }
560        if (vmDef == null) {
561            vmDef = appPipeline.fire(new GetVms().assignedFrom(model.name())
562                .assignedTo(user)).get().stream().map(VmData::definition)
563                .findFirst().orElse(null);
564        }
565        if (vmDef != null) {
566            result.addAll(vmDef.permissionsFor(user, roles));
567        }
568        return result;
569    }
570
571    private void updatePreview(ConsoleConnection channel, ResourceModel model,
572            VmDefinition vmDef) throws InterruptedException {
573        updateConfig(channel, model, vmDef);
574        updateVmDef(channel, model, vmDef);
575    }
576
577    private void updateConfig(ConsoleConnection channel, ResourceModel model,
578            VmDefinition vmDef) throws InterruptedException {
579        channel.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
580            model.getConletId(), "updateConfig", model.mode(), model.name(),
581            permissions(model, channel.session(), null, vmDef).stream()
582                .map(VmDefinition.Permission::toString).toList()));
583    }
584
585    private void updateVmDef(ConsoleConnection channel, ResourceModel model,
586            VmDefinition vmDef) throws InterruptedException {
587        Map<String, Object> data = null;
588        if (vmDef == null) {
589            model.setAssignedVm(null);
590        } else {
591            model.setAssignedVm(vmDef.name());
592            try {
593                data = Map.of("metadata",
594                    Map.of("namespace", vmDef.namespace(),
595                        "name", vmDef.name()),
596                    "spec", vmDef.spec(),
597                    "status", vmDef.getStatus());
598            } catch (JsonSyntaxException e) {
599                logger.log(Level.SEVERE, e,
600                    () -> "Failed to serialize VM definition");
601                return;
602            }
603        }
604        channel.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
605            model.getConletId(), "updateVmDefinition", data));
606    }
607
608    @Override
609    protected void doConletDeleted(ConletDeleted event,
610            ConsoleConnection channel, String conletId,
611            ResourceModel conletState)
612            throws Exception {
613        if (event.renderModes().isEmpty()) {
614            channel.respond(new KeyValueStoreUpdate().delete(
615                storagePath(channel.session(), conletId)));
616        }
617    }
618
619    /**
620     * Track the VM definitions and update conlets.
621     *
622     * @param event the event
623     * @param channel the channel
624     * @throws IOException 
625     * @throws InterruptedException 
626     */
627    @Handler(namedChannels = "manager")
628    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.ConfusingTernary", "PMD.CognitiveComplexity",
629        "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops", "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals",
630        "PMD.ConfusingArgumentToVarargsMethod" })
631    public void onVmDefChanged(VmDefChanged event, VmChannel channel)
632            throws IOException, InterruptedException {
633        var vmDef = event.vmDefinition();
634
635        // Update known conlets
636        for (var entry : conletIdsByConsoleConnection().entrySet()) {
637            var connection = entry.getKey();
638            for (var conletId : entry.getValue()) {
639                var model = stateFromSession(connection.session(), conletId);
640                if (model.isEmpty()
641                    || Strings.isNullOrEmpty(model.get().name())) {
642                    continue;
643                }
644                if (model.get().mode() == ResourceModel.Mode.VM) {
645                    // Check if this VM is used by conlet
646                    if (!Objects.areEqual(model.get().name(), vmDef.name())) {
647                        continue;
648                    }
649                    if (event.type() == K8sObserver.ResponseType.DELETED
650                        || permissions(vmDef, connection.session()).isEmpty()) {
651                        connection.respond(
652                            new DeleteConlet(conletId, Collections.emptySet()));
653                        continue;
654                    }
655                } else {
656                    // Check if VM is used by pool conlet or to be assigned to
657                    // it
658                    var user
659                        = WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(connection.session())
660                            .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse(null);
661                    var toBeUsedByConlet = vmDef.assignedFrom()
662                        .map(p -> p.equals(model.get().name())).orElse(false)
663                        && vmDef.assignedTo().map(u -> u.equals(user))
664                            .orElse(false);
665                    if (!Objects.areEqual(model.get().assignedVm(),
666                        vmDef.name()) && !toBeUsedByConlet) {
667                        continue;
668                    }
669
670                    // Now unassigned if VM is deleted or no longer to be used
671                    if (event.type() == K8sObserver.ResponseType.DELETED
672                        || !toBeUsedByConlet) {
673                        updateVmDef(connection, model.get(), null);
674                        continue;
675                    }
676                }
677
678                // Full update because permissions may have changed
679                updatePreview(connection, model.get(), vmDef);
680            }
681        }
682    }
683
684    /**
685     * On vm pool changed.
686     *
687     * @param event the event
688     * @param channel the channel
689     * @throws InterruptedException 
690     */
691    @Handler(namedChannels = "manager")
692    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops")
693    public void onVmPoolChanged(VmPoolChanged event)
694            throws InterruptedException {
695        var poolName = event.vmPool().name();
696        // Update known conlets
697        for (var entry : conletIdsByConsoleConnection().entrySet()) {
698            var connection = entry.getKey();
699            for (var conletId : entry.getValue()) {
700                var model = stateFromSession(connection.session(), conletId);
701                if (model.isEmpty()
702                    || model.get().mode() != ResourceModel.Mode.POOL
703                    || !Objects.areEqual(model.get().name(), poolName)) {
704                    continue;
705                }
706                if (event.deleted()
707                    || permissions(event.vmPool(), connection.session())
708                        .isEmpty()) {
709                    connection.respond(
710                        new DeleteConlet(conletId, Collections.emptySet()));
711                    continue;
712                }
713                updateConfig(connection, model.get(), null);
714            }
715        }
716    }
717
718    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.NcssCount", "PMD.CognitiveComplexity",
719        "PMD.AvoidLiteralsInIfCondition" })
720    @Override
721    protected void doUpdateConletState(NotifyConletModel event,
722            ConsoleConnection channel, ResourceModel model) throws Exception {
723        event.stop();
724        if ("selectedResource".equals(event.method())) {
725            selectResource(event, channel, model);
726            return;
727        }
728
729        Optional<VmData> vmData = getVmData(model, channel);
730        if (vmData.isEmpty()) {
731            if (model.mode() == ResourceModel.Mode.VM) {
732                return;
733            }
734            if ("start".equals(event.method())) {
735                // Assign a VM.
736                var user = WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(channel.session())
737                    .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse(null);
738                vmData = Optional.ofNullable(appPipeline
739                    .fire(new AssignVm(model.name(), user)).get());
740                if (vmData.isEmpty()) {
741                    ResourceBundle resourceBundle
742                        = resourceBundle(channel.locale());
743                    channel.respond(new DisplayNotification(
744                        resourceBundle.getString("poolEmptyNotification"),
745                        Map.of("autoClose", 10_000, "type", "Error")));
746                    return;
747                }
748            }
749        }
750
751        // Handle command for selected VM
752        var vmChannel = vmData.get().channel();
753        var vmDef = vmData.get().definition();
754        var vmName = vmDef.metadata().getName();
755        var perms = permissions(model, channel.session(), null, vmDef);
756        var resourceBundle = resourceBundle(channel.locale());
757        switch (event.method()) {
758        case "start":
759            if (perms.contains(VmDefinition.Permission.START)) {
760                fire(new ModifyVm(vmName, "state", "Running", vmChannel));
761            }
762            break;
763        case "stop":
764            if (perms.contains(VmDefinition.Permission.STOP)) {
765                fire(new ModifyVm(vmName, "state", "Stopped", vmChannel));
766            }
767            break;
768        case "reset":
769            if (perms.contains(VmDefinition.Permission.RESET)) {
770                confirmReset(event, channel, model, resourceBundle);
771            }
772            break;
773        case "resetConfirmed":
774            if (perms.contains(VmDefinition.Permission.RESET)) {
775                fire(new ResetVm(vmName), vmChannel);
776            }
777            break;
778        case "openConsole":
779            if (perms.contains(VmDefinition.Permission.ACCESS_CONSOLE)) {
780                openConsole(channel, model, vmChannel, vmDef, perms);
781            }
782            break;
783        default:// ignore
784            break;
785        }
786    }
787
788    private void openConsole(ConsoleConnection channel, ResourceModel model,
789            VmChannel vmChannel, VmDefinition vmDef, Set<Permission> perms) {
790        var resourceBundle = resourceBundle(channel.locale());
791        var user = WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(channel.session())
792            .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse("");
793        if (!vmDef.consoleAccessible(user, perms)) {
794            channel.respond(new DisplayNotification(
795                resourceBundle.getString("consoleTakenNotification"),
796                Map.of("autoClose", 5_000, "type", "Warning")));
797            return;
798        }
799        var pwQuery = Event.onCompletion(new GetDisplayPassword(vmDef, user),
800            e -> {
801                var data = vmDef.connectionFile(e.password().orElse(null),
802                    preferredIpVersion, deleteConnectionFile);
803                if (data == null) {
804                    return;
805                }
806                channel.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
807                    model.getConletId(), "openConsole", data));
808            });
809        fire(pwQuery, vmChannel);
810    }
811
812    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidLiteralsInIfCondition",
813        "PMD.UseLocaleWithCaseConversions" })
814    private void selectResource(NotifyConletModel event,
815            ConsoleConnection channel, ResourceModel model)
816            throws JsonProcessingException, InterruptedException {
817        try {
818            model.setMode(ResourceModel.Mode
819                .valueOf(event.<String> param(0).toUpperCase()));
820            model.setName(event.param(1));
821            String jsonState = objectMapper.writeValueAsString(model);
822            channel.respond(new KeyValueStoreUpdate().update(storagePath(
823                channel.session(), model.getConletId()), jsonState));
824            updatePreview(channel, model,
825                getVmData(model, channel).map(VmData::definition).orElse(null));
826        } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
827            logger.warning(() -> "Invalid resource type: " + e.getMessage());
828        }
829    }
830
831    private void confirmReset(NotifyConletModel event,
832            ConsoleConnection channel, ResourceModel model,
833            ResourceBundle resourceBundle) throws TemplateNotFoundException,
834            MalformedTemplateNameException, ParseException, IOException {
835        Template tpl = freemarkerConfig()
836            .getTemplate("VmAccess-confirmReset.ftl.html");
837        channel.respond(new OpenModalDialog(type(), model.getConletId(),
838            processTemplate(event, tpl,
839                fmModel(event, channel, model.getConletId(), model)))
840                    .addOption("cancelable", true).addOption("closeLabel", "")
841                    .addOption("title",
842                        resourceBundle.getString("confirmResetTitle")));
843    }
844
845    @Override
846    protected boolean doSetLocale(SetLocale event, ConsoleConnection channel,
847            String conletId) throws Exception {
848        return true;
849    }
850
851    /**
852     * The Class AccessModel.
853     */
854    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataClass")
855    public static class ResourceModel extends ConletBaseModel {
856
857        /**
858         * The Enum ResourceType.
859         */
860        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ShortVariable")
861        public enum Mode {
862            VM, POOL
863        }
864
865        private Mode mode;
866        private String name;
867        private String assignedVm;
868
869        /**
870         * Instantiates a new resource model.
871         *
872         * @param conletId the conlet id
873         */
874        public ResourceModel(@JsonProperty("conletId") String conletId) {
875            super(conletId);
876        }
877
878        /**
879         * Returns the mode.
880         *
881         * @return the resourceType
882         */
883        @JsonGetter("mode")
884        public Mode mode() {
885            return mode;
886        }
887
888        /**
889         * Sets the mode.
890         *
891         * @param mode the resource mode to set
892         */
893        public void setMode(Mode mode) {
894            this.mode = mode;
895        }
896
897        /**
898         * Gets the resource name.
899         *
900         * @return the string
901         */
902        @JsonGetter("name")
903        public String name() {
904            return name;
905        }
906
907        /**
908         * Sets the name.
909         *
910         * @param name the resource name to set
911         */
912        public void setName(String name) {
913            this.name = name;
914        }
915
916        /**
917         * Gets the assigned vm.
918         *
919         * @return the string
920         */
921        @JsonGetter("assignedVm")
922        public String assignedVm() {
923            return assignedVm;
924        }
925
926        /**
927         * Sets the assigned vm.
928         *
929         * @param name the assigned vm
930         */
931        public void setAssignedVm(String name) {
932            this.assignedVm = name;
933        }
934
935        @Override
936        public int hashCode() {
937            final int prime = 31;
938            int result = super.hashCode();
939            result = prime * result + java.util.Objects.hash(mode, name);
940            return result;
941        }
942
943        @Override
944        public boolean equals(Object obj) {
945            if (this == obj) {
946                return true;
947            }
948            if (!super.equals(obj)) {
949                return false;
950            }
951            if (getClass() != obj.getClass()) {
952                return false;
953            }
954            ResourceModel other = (ResourceModel) obj;
955            return mode == other.mode
956                && java.util.Objects.equals(name, other.name);
957        }
958
959        @Override
960        public String toString() {
961            StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder(50);
962            builder.append("AccessModel [mode=").append(mode)
963                .append(", name=").append(name).append(']');
964            return builder.toString();
965        }
966    }
967}
